title: Mac's Workout
challenge: Do 10 push-ups while shouting "I'M A FIVE-STAR MAN!" after each one. If you can't complete them: drink for each one you missed. If you do it: opposing team drinks.

title: Charlie's Teeth
challenge: Eat something crunchy (crackers, chips) while making exaggerated chewing sounds for 1 minute. If you stop early: drink. If you complete it: choose someone to drink.

title: Dee's Dance
challenge: Perform an interpretive dance representing "a bird trying to be human" for 45 seconds. If anyone laughs: they drink. If no one laughs: you drink twice.

title: Frank's Crawl
challenge: Army crawl across the room while narrating your journey like a nature documentary. If you break character: drink. If you make it: opposing team drinks.

title: Dennis's Poise
challenge: Stand on one foot for 2 minutes while maintaining perfect posture and a smug expression. If you fall or break expression: drink. If you succeed: everyone else drinks.

title: Kitten Mittens Test
challenge: Put socks on your hands and try to pick up 5 small objects. You have 3 minutes. For each object you can't pick up: drink. If you get all 5: opposing team drinks twice.

title: Yoga with Dee
challenge: Attempt to touch your toes while explaining why you're better than everyone else. If you can't touch your toes OR if you stop talking: drink.

title: Charlie's Mailroom
challenge: Sort a deck of cards by suit as fast as possible while humming the theme to It's Always Sunny. If you take longer than 3 minutes: drink. If you mess up the humming: drink.

title: Mac's Bulk
challenge: Hold a gallon of water (or equivalent weight) above your head for 1 minute while explaining your workout routine. If you drop it or stop talking: drink twice.

title: Frank's Coil
challenge: Spin in place 10 times, then try to walk in a straight line across the room. If you stumble or veer off course: drink. If you make it: opposing team drinks.

title: Fight Milk Challenge
challenge: WILDCARD! Everyone must do jumping jacks while making crow sounds. Last person standing wins - everyone else drinks twice.

title: Physical Immunity
challenge: WILDCARD! Your team is immune to all physical challenges for the next 2 cards. You automatically succeed and opposing teams automatically fail.
